title: Presidential Determination on Designation of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia as a Major Non-NATO Ally
summary: Presidential Determination No. 2026-03, issued on January 13, 2026, designates the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia as a Major Non-NATO Ally of the United States. This designation is made under the authority of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 and the Arms Export Control Act. The determination was published in the Federal Register on January 23, 2026.
